about_the_game:
You'll be following Neo, a young idol dissatisfied with her life. After suddenly moving to a new school for one week, she finds herself wrapped up in the school's student council and its (unofficial) idol group.

But all takes an unexpected turn once a simple accident causes our cast to delve deeper into the school's lower floor. During a series of investigations done by the astute Detective Emilia Ruth, your actions will determine the conclusion of the case as well as the story as a whole.

So get ready to call the tune!

Key Features



  • A mix of detective and idol games: You are provided with a variety of minigames and game mechanics to enrich the experience.

  • Dynamic Storytelling: Every decision you make as Neo will influence the narrative. Your choices will shape relationships, uncover secrets, and determine the fate of the characters and the school itself.

  • Inventory: During the game, you can find items that will unlock new interactions.

  • Unlockable extra art: Some special events will reward you with extra art in the form of cards.


This game contains disturbing imagery that may be out of tune with some players.
